comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: It's a funny date too that halving happened at 4/20, I guess that this is a sign that bitcoin's going to blaze and get so high that we would be flabbergasted at the pump that's going to happen, it's a nice touch and hopefully we see more people get into bitcoin with this monumental event for bitcoin. It's never too late for them if they ever do because bitcoin will only go up, it's never going to be a bad investment despite the argument that it's volatile, there's no way for bitcoin besides going up.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: Happy 4th Bitcoin Halving.Bitcoin Halving is one of the most awaited moments by investors because it is considered capable of improving market conditions because Bitcoin is still the main driver in the crypto asset market. As with general economic principles, Halving Bitcoin will increase demand and will also continue to increase the price of Bitcoin. Preparations need to be made one way or another now before paying higher prices for Bitcoin in the near future. Even though basically the market will continue to rise or fall, in the end, no matter how difficult the circumstances, Bitcoin will continue to spread its wings to fly even higher.
